name: Don't Tread on Tank!
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2018

You are in the last, best tank developed by the Blue Army. This isn't saying much since they didn't have time to put treads on. At least you have a massive gun to help move your equally massive tank (probably should wait until the last minute to implement key features)! Now head out to the front and take back your homeland from the Orange Invaders.

A is to turn right

D is to turn left

Space is to shoot

You don't have treads, so you gotta use your gun's recoil to move.
